channel.title: neunorm on Jean Bilheux
channel.description: Recent content in neunorm on Jean Bilheux

item.title: Gamma Filtering
item.description: Introduction When working with neutorn imaging files, one of the first thing we need to do is removing the gamma spots. Those spots are pixel that recorded gammas strikes, not neutrons strikes. To do so, we are going to use the convolve library from scipy. Initialize Fake Data Set import numpy as np from scipy.ndimage import convolve # let's create a 10x10 random array of values between 0 and 1 my_array = np.
